home.footer: You are not alone. Support is always available.

calm.title: Calming Activities
calm.subtitle: Find a moment of peace with our curated activities.
calm.defaultEncouragement: Great job on taking time for yourself!

breathing.greatJob: Great job! You can stop when you are ready.
breathing.chooseDescription: Select a breathing exercise that feels right for you.

default.name: Standard Calm Breathing
default.description: A simple technique to start: 4s in, 7s hold, 8s out. Helps to calm your nervous system.

box.name: Box Breathing
box.description: Also known as four-square breathing. Inhale for 4s, hold for 4s, exhale for 4s, hold for 4s. Excellent for focus.

4-7-8.name: 4-7-8 Breathing
4-7-8.description: Inhale for 4s, hold for 7s, then a long exhale for 8s. A powerful technique for relaxation and sleep.

chat.initialMessage: Hello! I'm Aarambh, your AI wellness companion. How are you feeling today? You can talk to me about anything on your mind.
chat.errorMessage: Sorry, I am having trouble connecting. Please try again later.

crisis.title: It sounds like you're going through a lot.
crisis.description: Please know that help is available and you don't have to go through this alone. Connecting with a trained professional right now can provide you with the support you need.

story.generatingDescription: This might take a moment. The AI is writing the script and preparing its voice.
